name: Alphabet Inc.
description: Alphabet Inc. is a multinational technology conglomerate that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

name: Apple Inc.
description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories worldwide. The company serves consumers, small and mid-sized businesses, education, enterprise, and government customers.

name: Spotify Technology
description: Spotify Technology S.A. operates as an audio streaming platform worldwide. The company offers music and podcast content to users from record labels and media companies.

name: Slack
description: Slack Technologies, Inc. operates a proprietary business communication platform worldwide that brings teams together wherever they are.

name: Tesla Inc.
description: Tesla Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, leases, and sells electric vehicles, and energy generation and storage systems in the United States, China, and internationally.

name: Microsoft Corp.
description: Microsoft Corporation develops, licenses, and supports software, services, devices, and solutions worldwide.

name: Meta Platforms
description: Meta Platforms, Inc. develops products that enable people to connect and share with friends and family through mobile devices, personal computers, virtual reality headsets, and wearables worldwide.
